pairs.key: Probability of being seen directly proportional to stupidity of act.
pairs.value: ※Probability of being seen directly proportional to stupidity of act.

pairs.key: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
pairs.value: ※Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.

pairs.key: Love is as necessary as food and shelter.
pairs.value: ※Love is as necessary as food and shelter.

pairs.key: May all your trades be great!
pairs.value: ※May all your trades be great!

pairs.key: Only difference between a rut and a grave is depth.
pairs.value: ※Only difference between a rut and a grave is depth.

pairs.key: Practice safe eating. Always use condiments.
pairs.value: ※Practice safe eating. Always use condiments.

pairs.key: Don't eat the paper. (Paper)
pairs.value: ※Don't eat the paper. (Paper)

pairs.key: You can open doors with your charm and patience.
pairs.value: ※You can open doors with your charm and patience.

pairs.key: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
pairs.value: ※Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.

pairs.key: There is no mistake so great as that of being always right.
pairs.value: ※There is no mistake so great as that of being always right.

pairs.key: Money will come to you when you are doing the right thing.
pairs.value: ※Money will come to you when you are doing the right thing.

pairs.key: Very Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 非常稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: At times, it is better to know when to exit than when to enter.
pairs.value: ※At times, it is better to know when to exit than when to enter.

pairs.key: No matter what your past has been, you a have a spotless future.
pairs.value: ※No matter what your past has been, you a have a spotless future.

pairs.key: Stop wishing. Start doing.
pairs.value: ※Stop wishing. Start doing.

pairs.key: Your worst enemy has a crush on you!
pairs.value: ※Your worst enemy has a crush on you!

pairs.key: A closed mouth gathers no feet.
pairs.value: ※A closed mouth gathers no feet.

pairs.key: Put your unhappiness aside. Life is beautiful, be happy.
pairs.value: ※Put your unhappiness aside. Life is beautiful, be happy.

pairs.key: Someone will invite you to a Karaoke party.
pairs.value: ※Someone will invite you to a Karaoke party.

pairs.key: Person who give self-haircut after rice wine will be buzzed.
pairs.value: ※Person who give self-haircut after rice wine will be buzzed.

pairs.key: Uncommon Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 不寻常的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: The wise man is the one that makes you think that he is dumb.
pairs.value: ※The wise man is the one that makes you think that he is dumb.

pairs.key: Big journeys begin with a single step.
pairs.value: ※Big journeys begin with a single step.

pairs.key: Soon, a visitor shall delight you.
pairs.value: ※Soon, a visitor shall delight you.

pairs.key: Before you can be reborn you must die.
pairs.value: ※Before you can be reborn you must die.

pairs.key: Bad luck and misfortune will follow you.
pairs.value: ※Bad luck and misfortune will follow you.

pairs.key: He who laughs last is laughing at you.
pairs.value: ※He who laughs last is laughing at you.

pairs.key: People who are late are often happier than those who have to wait for them.
pairs.value: ※People who are late are often happier than those who have to wait for them.

pairs.key: A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not why ships are built.
pairs.value: ※A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not why ships are built.

pairs.key: If at first you don't succeed, skydiving not for you.
pairs.value: ※If at first you don't succeed, skydiving not for you.

pairs.key: Patience is a virtue, unless its against a brick wall.
pairs.value: ※Patience is a virtue, unless its against a brick wall.

pairs.key: Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
pairs.value: ※Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.

pairs.key: Circumstance does not make the man; it reveals him to himself.
pairs.value: ※Circumstance does not make the man; it reveals him to himself.

pairs.key: Do not let what you do not have prevent you from using what you do have.
pairs.value: ※Do not let what you do not have prevent you from using what you do have.

pairs.key: The greatest risk is not taking one.
pairs.value: ※The greatest risk is not taking one.

pairs.key: Your fortune is as sweet as a cookie.
pairs.value: ※Your fortune is as sweet as a cookie.

pairs.key: Don't pursue happiness... create it.
pairs.value: ※Don't pursue happiness... create it.

pairs.key: You have the deepest interest in all that is artistic.
pairs.value: ※You have the deepest interest in all that is artistic.

pairs.key: Tomorrow at breakfast, listen carefully: do what rice krispies tell you to.
pairs.value: ※Tomorrow at breakfast, listen carefully: do what rice krispies tell you to.

pairs.key: You will conquer obstacles to achieve success.
pairs.value: ※You will conquer obstacles to achieve success.

pairs.key: One that would have the fruit must climb the tree.
pairs.value: ※One that would have the fruit must climb the tree.

pairs.key: Some men dream of fortunes, others dream of cookies.
pairs.value: ※Some men dream of fortunes, others dream of cookies.

pairs.key: A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.
pairs.value: ※A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.

pairs.key: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together as they do in you.
pairs.value: ※Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together as they do in you.

pairs.key: You will soon witness a miracle
pairs.value: ※You will soon witness a miracle

pairs.key: Stay true to those who would do the same for you.
pairs.value: ※Stay true to those who would do the same for you.

pairs.key: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
pairs.value: ※A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.

pairs.key: Extremely Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 极其稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: Don't worry about money. The best things in life are free.
pairs.value: ※Don't worry about money. The best things in life are free.

pairs.key: The usefulness of a cup is in its emptiness.
pairs.value: ※The usefulness of a cup is in its emptiness.

pairs.key: Old friends make best friends
pairs.value: ※Old friends make best friends

pairs.key: You will be hungry again in one hour.
pairs.value: ※You will be hungry again in one hour.

pairs.key: Ones always regrets what could have done. Remember for next time.
pairs.value: ※Ones always regrets what could have done. Remember for next time.

pairs.key: You are a hero to someone!
pairs.value: ※You are a hero to someone!

pairs.key: If you have kleptomania. Take something for it.
pairs.value: ※If you have kleptomania. Take something for it.

pairs.key: If you look back, you'll soon be going that way.
pairs.value: ※If you look back, you'll soon be going that way.

pairs.key: Some days you are pigeon, some days you are statue. Today, bring umbrella.
pairs.value: ※Some days you are pigeon, some days you are statue. Today, bring umbrella.

pairs.key: Fortune not found? Abort, Retry, Ignore.
pairs.value: ※Fortune not found? Abort, Retry, Ignore.

pairs.key: Everyday is a new day, but tomorrow is never promised.
pairs.value: ※Everyday is a new day, but tomorrow is never promised.

pairs.key: Of all our human resources, the most precious is the desire to improve.
pairs.value: ※Of all our human resources, the most precious is the desire to improve.

pairs.key: Love is free. Lust will cost you everything you have.
pairs.value: ※Love is free. Lust will cost you everything you have.

pairs.key: I have a dream....Time to go to bed.
pairs.value: ※I have a dream....Time to go to bed.

pairs.key: You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.
pairs.value: ※You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.

pairs.key: The gods have smiled upon you!
pairs.value: ※The gods have smiled upon you!

pairs.key: Ninety-nine percent of all lawyers give the rest a bad name.
pairs.value: ※Ninety-nine percent of all lawyers give the rest a bad name.

pairs.key: The secret to staying young is good health and lying about your age.
pairs.value: ※The secret to staying young is good health and lying about your age.

pairs.key: To determine whether someone is beautiful is not by looking at their appearance, but their heart.
pairs.value: ※To determine whether someone is beautiful is not by looking at their appearance, but their heart.

pairs.key: The cooler you think you are the dumber you look
pairs.value: ※The cooler you think you are the dumber you look

pairs.key: Land is always on the mind of a flying bird.
pairs.value: ※Land is always on the mind of a flying bird.

pairs.key: The greatest danger could be your stupidity.
pairs.value: ※The greatest danger could be your stupidity.

pairs.key: Everyone agrees you are the best.
pairs.value: ※Everyone agrees you are the best.

pairs.key: A golden egg of opportunity falls into your lap this month.
pairs.value: ※A golden egg of opportunity falls into your lap this month.

pairs.key: Do not mistake temptation for opportunity.
pairs.value: ※Do not mistake temptation for opportunity.

pairs.key: You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime.
pairs.value: ※You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime.

pairs.key: The older you get, the better you were.
pairs.value: ※The older you get, the better you were.

pairs.key: Hardly anyone knows how much is gained by ignoring the future.
pairs.value: ※Hardly anyone knows how much is gained by ignoring the future.

pairs.key: Be direct,usually one can accomplish more that way.
pairs.value: ※Be direct,usually one can accomplish more that way.

pairs.key: The problem with resisting temptation is that it may never come again.
pairs.value: ※The problem with resisting temptation is that it may never come again.

pairs.key: Your road to glory will be rocky but fulfilling.
pairs.value: ※Your road to glory will be rocky but fulfilling.

pairs.key: He who throws dirt is losing ground. (DIRT)
pairs.value: ※He who throws dirt is losing ground. (DIRT)

pairs.key: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
pairs.value: ※Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.

pairs.key: Stop eating now. Food poisoning no fun.
pairs.value: ※Stop eating now. Food poisoning no fun.

pairs.key: You will live long enough to open many fortune cookies.
pairs.value: ※You will live long enough to open many fortune cookies.

pairs.key: Everything will now come your way.
pairs.value: ※Everything will now come your way.

pairs.key: The important thing is to never stop questioning.
pairs.value: ※The important thing is to never stop questioning.

pairs.key: You will make many changes before settling down happily.
pairs.value: ※You will make many changes before settling down happily.

pairs.key: When in doubt, let your instincts guide you.
pairs.value: ※When in doubt, let your instincts guide you.

pairs.key: Time may fly by, but memories do not.
pairs.value: ※Time may fly by, but memories do not.

pairs.key: Success lies in the hands of those who wants it.
pairs.value: ※Success lies in the hands of those who wants it.

pairs.key: There are big changes ahead of you.  They will be good ones!
pairs.value: ※There are big changes ahead of you.  They will be good ones!

pairs.key: The days that make us happy make us wise.
pairs.value: ※The days that make us happy make us wise.

pairs.key: You love peace.
pairs.value: ※You love peace.

pairs.key: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
pairs.value: ※The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.

pairs.key: The simplest answer is to act.
pairs.value: ※The simplest answer is to act.

pairs.key: Your smile brings happiness to everyone you meet.
pairs.value: ※Your smile brings happiness to everyone you meet.

pairs.key: Life is too short to waste time hating anyone.
pairs.value: ※Life is too short to waste time hating anyone.

pairs.key: Gold is in your future.
pairs.value: ※Gold is in your future.

pairs.key: It takes less time to do a thing right than it does to explain why you did it wrong.
pairs.value: ※It takes less time to do a thing right than it does to explain why you did it wrong.

pairs.key: If a turtle doesn't have a shell, is it naked or homeless?
pairs.value: ※If a turtle doesn't have a shell, is it naked or homeless?

pairs.key: Wise person needs either good manners or fast reflexes.
pairs.value: ※Wise person needs either good manners or fast reflexes.

pairs.key: You will be called to fill a position of high honor and responsibility.
pairs.value: ※You will be called to fill a position of high honor and responsibility.

pairs.key: Change is inevitable, except for vending machines.
pairs.value: ※Change is inevitable, except for vending machines.

pairs.key: A cheerful message is on its way to you.
pairs.value: ※A cheerful message is on its way to you.

pairs.key: We cannot change the direction of the wind, but we can adjust our sails.
pairs.value: ※We cannot change the direction of the wind, but we can adjust our sails.

pairs.key: Tell them what you really think. Otherwise, nothing will change.
pairs.value: ※Tell them what you really think. Otherwise, nothing will change.

pairs.key: Adjust finances, make budgets, to improve you standing.
pairs.value: ※Adjust finances, make budgets, to improve you standing.

pairs.key: A kiss is not a kiss without the heart.
pairs.value: ※A kiss is not a kiss without the heart.

pairs.key: An admirer is concealing their affection for you.
pairs.value: ※An admirer is concealing their affection for you.

pairs.key: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
pairs.value: ※You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.

pairs.key: Fear is interest paid on a debt you may not owe.
pairs.value: ※Fear is interest paid on a debt you may not owe.

pairs.key: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
pairs.value: ※One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.

pairs.key: We don't know the future, but here's a cookie.
pairs.value: ※We don't know the future, but here's a cookie.

pairs.key: You create enthusiasm around you.
pairs.value: ※You create enthusiasm around you.

pairs.key: He who dies with most toys, still dies.
pairs.value: ※He who dies with most toys, still dies.

pairs.key: Instead of worrying and agonizing, move ahead constructively.
pairs.value: ※Instead of worrying and agonizing, move ahead constructively.

pairs.key: No distance is too far, if two hearts are tied together.
pairs.value: ※No distance is too far, if two hearts are tied together.

pairs.key: Everyone seems normal until you get to know them.
pairs.value: ※Everyone seems normal until you get to know them.

pairs.key: Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.
pairs.value: ※Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.

pairs.key: Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: The world may be your oyster, but it doesn't mean you'll get its pearl.
pairs.value: ※The world may be your oyster, but it doesn't mean you'll get its pearl.

pairs.key: Person who eat fortune cookie get lousy dessert.
pairs.value: ※Person who eat fortune cookie get lousy dessert.

pairs.key: The pleasure of what you enjoy is lost by wanting more.
pairs.value: ※The pleasure of what you enjoy is lost by wanting more.

pairs.value: ※The pleasure of what you enjoy is lost by wanting more.

pairs.key: Difficulty at the beginning usually means ease at the end.
pairs.value: ※Difficulty at the beginning usually means ease at the end.

pairs.key: A stranger is a friend you have not spoken to yet.
pairs.value: ※A stranger is a friend you have not spoken to yet.

pairs.key: Age is high price to pay for maturity.
pairs.value: ※Age is high price to pay for maturity.

pairs.key: Person who rests on laurels gets thorn in backside.
pairs.value: ※Person who rests on laurels gets thorn in backside.

pairs.key: You are broad minded and socially active.
pairs.value: ※You are broad minded and socially active.

pairs.key: Smart husband buys wife fine china. Then she not trust him to wash it.
pairs.value: ※Smart husband buys wife fine china. Then she not trust him to wash it.

pairs.key: Your many hidden talents will become obvious to those around you.
pairs.value: ※Your many hidden talents will become obvious to those around you.

pairs.key: Inside every old person is young person wondering what the hell happened.
pairs.value: ※Inside every old person is young person wondering what the hell happened.

pairs.key: The fortune you seek is in another cookie.
pairs.value: ※The fortune you seek is in another cookie.

pairs.key: Legendary Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 传说级幸运饼干：

pairs.key: You are the controller of your destiny.
pairs.value: ※You are the controller of your destiny.

pairs.key: Your golden opportunity is coming shortly.
pairs.value: ※Your golden opportunity is coming shortly.

pairs.key: For success today look first to yourself.
pairs.value: ※For success today look first to yourself.

pairs.key: It's about time I got out of that cookie.
pairs.value: ※It's about time I got out of that cookie.

pairs.key: You will soon have an out of money experience.
pairs.value: ※You will soon have an out of money experience.

pairs.key: Minor aches today are likely to pay off handsomely tomorrow.
pairs.value: ※Minor aches today are likely to pay off handsomely tomorrow.

pairs.key: Atheism no fun. No holidays.
pairs.value: ※Atheism no fun. No holidays.

pairs.key: You are given the chance to take part in an exciting adventure.
pairs.value: ※You are given the chance to take part in an exciting adventure.

pairs.key: Procrastination is art of keeping up with yesterday.
pairs.value: ※Procrastination is art of keeping up with yesterday.

pairs.key: Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.
pairs.value: ※Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.

pairs.key: Your emotional nature is strong and sensitive
pairs.value: ※Your emotional nature is strong and sensitive

pairs.key: An alien of some sort will be appearing to you shortly.
pairs.value: ※An alien of some sort will be appearing to you shortly.

pairs.key: A foolish man listens to his heart. A wise man listens to cookies.
pairs.value: ※A foolish man listens to his heart. A wise man listens to cookies.

pairs.key: When marriage outlawed, only outlaws have in-laws.
pairs.value: ※When marriage outlawed, only outlaws have in-laws.

pairs.key: Do not be overly judgemental of your loved one's intentions or actions.
pairs.value: ※Do not be overly judgemental of your loved one's intentions or actions.

pairs.key: He who seeks will find.
pairs.value: ※He who seeks will find.

pairs.key: Okay to look at past and future. Just don't stare.
pairs.value: ※Okay to look at past and future. Just don't stare.

pairs.key: A merry heart does good like a medicine.
pairs.value: ※A merry heart does good like a medicine.

pairs.key: The real kindness comes from within you.
pairs.value: ※The real kindness comes from within you.

pairs.key: A fool and his money are soon partying.
pairs.value: ※A fool and his money are soon partying.

pairs.key: I am worth a fortune!
pairs.value: ※I am worth a fortune!

pairs.key: Easiest way to find lost object is buy replacement.
pairs.value: ※Easiest way to find lost object is buy replacement.

pairs.key: Politicians are like diapers: change often, and for same reason.
pairs.value: ※Politicians are like diapers: change often, and for same reason.

pairs.key: At this very moment you can change the rest of your life.
pairs.value: ※At this very moment you can change the rest of your life.

pairs.key: A dream you have will come true
pairs.value: ※A dream you have will come true

pairs.key: Present your best ideas today to an eager and welcoming audience.
pairs.value: ※Present your best ideas today to an eager and welcoming audience.

pairs.key: Common Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 常见的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: Flattery will go far tonight.
pairs.value: ※Flattery will go far tonight.

pairs.key: Help! I am being held prisoner in a fortune cookie factory.
pairs.value: ※Help! I am being held prisoner in a fortune cookie factory.

pairs.key: Be calm when confronting an emergency crisis.
pairs.value: ※Be calm when confronting an emergency crisis.

pairs.key: The best is yet to come.
pairs.value: ※The best is yet to come.

pairs.key: You will think for yourself when you stop letting others think for you
pairs.value: ※You will think for yourself when you stop letting others think for you

pairs.key: Patience is your alley at the moment. Don't worry!
pairs.value: ※Patience is your alley at the moment. Don't worry!

pairs.key: The cake is a lie!
pairs.value: ※The cake is a lie!

pairs.key: It may be those who do most, dream most
pairs.value: ※It may be those who do most, dream most

pairs.key: Your reality check is about to bounce.
pairs.value: ※Your reality check is about to bounce.

pairs.key: Nothing is so much to be feared as fear.
pairs.value: ※Nothing is so much to be feared as fear.

pairs.key: Now these three remain, faith, hope, and love. The greatest of these is love.
pairs.value: ※Now these three remain, faith, hope, and love. The greatest of these is love.

pairs.key: Compassion is a way of being.
pairs.value: ※Compassion is a way of being.

pairs.key: You are cleverly disguised as responsible adult.
pairs.value: ※You are cleverly disguised as responsible adult.

pairs.key: Do what is right, not what you should.
pairs.value: ※Do what is right, not what you should.

pairs.key: What breaks in a moment may take years to mend.
pairs.value: ※What breaks in a moment may take years to mend.

pairs.key: Drive like hell, you will get there.
pairs.value: ※Drive like hell, you will get there.

pairs.key: What some call stubbornness, others call persistence.
pairs.value: ※What some call stubbornness, others call persistence.

pairs.key: You will be sharing great news with all people you love
pairs.value: ※You will be sharing great news with all people you love

pairs.key: If you want the rainbow, then you have to tolerate the rain.
pairs.value: ※If you want the rainbow, then you have to tolerate the rain.

pairs.key: Hard work pays off in the future. Laziness pays off now.
pairs.value: ※Hard work pays off in the future. Laziness pays off now.

pairs.key: Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.
pairs.value: ※Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.

pairs.key: If you have something good in your life, don't let it go!
pairs.value: ※If you have something good in your life, don't let it go!

pairs.key: Today you shed your last tear. Tomorrow fortune knocks at your door.
pairs.value: ※Today you shed your last tear. Tomorrow fortune knocks at your door.

pairs.key: You will die alone and poorly dressed.
pairs.value: ※You will die alone and poorly dressed.

pairs.key: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.
pairs.value: ※Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.

pairs.key: Good health will be yours for a long time.
pairs.value: ※Good health will be yours for a long time.

pairs.key: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
pairs.value: ※Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.

pairs.key: There is no spoon!
pairs.value: ※There is no spoon!

pairs.key: You are worth loving, you are also worth the effort it takes to love you
pairs.value: ※You are worth loving, you are also worth the effort it takes to love you

pairs.key: Never upset the driver of the car you're in. They're the master of your destiny until you get home.
pairs.value: ※Never upset the driver of the car you're in. They're the master of your destiny until you get home.

pairs.key: Fat person not afraid of heights... afraid of widths.
pairs.value: ※Fat person not afraid of heights... afraid of widths.

pairs.key: Live like you are on the bottom, even if you are on the top.
pairs.value: ※Live like you are on the bottom, even if you are on the top.

pairs.key: Before trying to please others think of what makes you happy.
pairs.value: ※Before trying to please others think of what makes you happy.

pairs.key: All things are difficult before they are easy.
pairs.value: ※All things are difficult before they are easy.

pairs.key: Experience is what you have left when everything else is gone.
pairs.value: ※Experience is what you have left when everything else is gone.

pairs.key: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
pairs.value: ※To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.

pairs.key: It is better to have a hen tomorrow than an egg today.
pairs.value: ※It is better to have a hen tomorrow than an egg today.

pairs.key: He who throws mud loses ground.
pairs.value: ※He who throws mud loses ground.

pairs.key: When chosen for jury duty, tell judge... fortune cookie say guilty!
pairs.value: ※When chosen for jury duty, tell judge... fortune cookie say guilty!

pairs.key: You will take a pleasant journey to a place far away.
pairs.value: ※You will take a pleasant journey to a place far away.

pairs.key: There is a prospect of a thrilling time ahead for you.
pairs.value: ※There is a prospect of a thrilling time ahead for you.

pairs.key: You think it's a secret, but they know.
pairs.value: ※You think it's a secret, but they know.

pairs.key: He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
pairs.value: ※He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.

pairs.key: Ask yourself if what you are doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.
pairs.value: ※Ask yourself if what you are doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.

pairs.key: If you want the rainbow, you have to tolerate the rain.
pairs.value: ※If you want the rainbow, you have to tolerate the rain.

pairs.key: Sing and rejoice, fortune is smiling on you.
pairs.value: ※Sing and rejoice, fortune is smiling on you.

pairs.key: Life does not get better by chance. It gets better by change.
pairs.value: ※Life does not get better by chance. It gets better by change.

pairs.key: A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study.
pairs.value: ※A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study.
